answer: Everything you say sounds reason- able. But there's also a reason- able explanation for the opposite.

question: Don't give me that! Not another word! When you had the Fat Lady in there, and I asked you if she was lying, you looked me right in the eyes and said yes. So as far as I was concerned, she's ly- ing. And if the King of fucking England had walked in & told me different, I wouldn't have bel- ieved him - because you told me ..
answer: I dunno what I can do to help you?

question: I dunno what I'd do with your help. I've gotta take her out of there ..
answer: What about Citrine?

question: Screw Citrine. He can fire me. Has he got your aunt's address?
answer: I don't think so .. He said the police had been calling .. want- ed to ask me some more questions ..

question: Who? Probably Angelo .. I'll take care of it .. Don't worry, we- 're gonna find this guy, and everything'll be O.K. .. O.K.? You're looking worried again, Helena?
answer: No I'm not.

question: You're looking more worried now than when you "decided to stop worrying"?
answer: Alright, I'm worried about Christmas. I wish I hadn't told him I'd be back ..

question: He'll get over it. I'll roast us a chicken, O.K. With cand- les around it. How about that?
answer: Wouldn't it be better if I cook it? You said, you can only boil?

question: Not "you" blue. This isn't you.
answer: When did John divorce?

question: Two or three years ago.
answer: What was she like?

question: Suzanne? Very pretty. She was a semi- professional model. But a policeman's wife she wasn't. So one day, she just packed it and left. And his whole life went straight down the nearest toilet.
answer: What does that mean?

question: You know, he crashed. He just couldn't come to terms with it .. John hates to lose, and he hated losing her .. Every spare minute, he's driving down to San Diego, having a terrible time with her, getting drunk, and driving back .. you just don't believe the amount he drank ..
answer: You think he still loves her?

question: Think he still thinks about her. But not like then. Then was an obsession.
answer: I haven't worn heels since I was 16. I don't think I could walk in these?

question: Sure you can. Anyway, parties are all about standing still ..
answer: You think John would like it?

question: You can't get in there .. That's "Comanche Proof."
answer: Jesus. What are you doin?

question: I spose I'm drinking myself to sleep. It's Helena's Christmas songs .. they're really pretty ..
answer: Have you got any Glasers? Twenty fives?

question: What exactly you doing, John?
answer: I'm going up to the institute.

question: Now?
answer: This "cop" that's calling, thinks she gonna be there over Christmas.

question: Well, let's hope he does ..
answer: Listen, you don't havta come?

question: Hey .. Where's your watch?
answer: I guess by the bed.

question: It's twenty of three.
answer: Bull shit .. I'm in my prime ..

question: Bits.
answer: What d'you mean, "bits."

question: Policemen's bodies age at diff- erent rates. Look at me. Gut in its fifties. Balls in their six- ties. And feet in their eighties ..
answer: Hit those wipers, Ross.

question: What if we need a back up?
answer: We're not here. I don't want the desk to hear us .. Alright. I'll start at the top, and work down.

question: You ain't going in alone?
answer: That's a liability, Ross. I don't want you hanging on to my shirt. Anyone but me comes down these stairs, take em out but try and keep him alive. I want this bastard living ..

question: What the hell's going on up there, Brother? I been calling 10 minutes.
answer: Where's Margie?

question: Where's Margie?
answer: Taken Bobby to her sister's ..

question: Does he know?
answer: Thinks his dad's in hospital.

question: I want you to go to your Aunt's.
answer: Why can't I stay with you?

question: It's not possible right now.
answer: Why?

question: Please don't ask no quest- ions now .. Not right now ..
answer: Is that Margie?

question: What are you doing, Travis?
answer: I been told to take your car in, Sir.

question: Why?
answer: I dunno, Sir. Brought you up a Chevy.

question: You got a warrant for this?
answer: Yes, Sir.

question: Who sought the warrant?
answer: The man from the F.B.I.

question: I want a 24 hour protection of Margie's house. Otherwise I'm not saying nothing. You give me that, or read me my rights, and talk to a lawyer.
answer: Alright, you got it. And I'll be putting an Observer in with you.

question: I want Serato .. Why can't I have Serato?
answer: Coz I'm short of men & Ang- elo won't do it .. Who ever I got free first - you get ..

question: .. I know why you did it darlin, but you're not helping me. Every- thing they're hearing they think is a lie. Now here comes the man I'm desperate to prove exists, & whadda-ya-know, he turns up at my house, and has a "chat" with you?
answer: Don't say that. Don't you dare say that .. I believe you ..

question: I know you're trying to help me, but you don't understand.
answer: Then explain it to me. I got enough darkness, don't I?

question: The man who killed Amber is a psychopath. He was up at the in- stitute to kill you - he don't wanna kill Rose - he was there to kill you - that's the truth - and I didn't wanna tell it to you - but that's the reason I want you to stay at Margie's - coz I can't protect you here ..
answer: Why does he want to kill me?

question: Coz he thinks you're a witness.
answer: I can't identify him ..

question: He don't know that. I didn't.
answer: Then why didn't he kill me?

question: Will you fucken stop it. I'm not Serato .. He didn't kill you coz he wasn't here .. he isn't in the room with you, and lets you live ..
answer: Kiss me, John .. Kiss me I love you, kiss me again I love you .. Are my lips lying to you? Kiss my mouth Is my mouth lying to you? He. Was. Here. I just remembered something ..

question: A "breath freshener?"
answer: I heard it hiss, twice.

question: ... he's either here to take something .. or leave some- thing .. I don't find nothing ..
answer: You gotta stop drinking, darling.

question: He doesn't need my help.
answer: I know about alcohol, John.

question: You do?
answer: I'm blind because my father drank.

question: You don't wanna sit here any more, sweetheart ..
answer: I wanna be near you ...

question: I think they're gonna arrest me.
answer: I don't want them to arrest you.

question: It's not as bad as it sounds .. They can't refuse me bail. Raise bail of my own cognizance & find the best damned lawyer there is ..
answer: Oh, John, I'd do anything, anything, to get you free.

question: I'm sorry to trouble you, but eh .. Wait a minute, don't I know you?
answer: As I said, Sergeant, you nearly ran into me? What's the problem?

question: I'm afraid it's the "van" again.
answer: The van?

question: Is it your vehicle?
answer: No, my mother's .. You better stop in .. I'm just here to feed the cat.

question: I'm sorry to worry you with this, but we had a real serious robbery, and we- 're chasing a white V.W. van? You guy came up an the computer, so as a matt- er of routine we have to check. Could you tell me who's driven it recently?
answer: Only me and Mom ..

question: How about any guys on your staff?
answer: We only got one .. He doesn't drive. He is my boyfriend. My fath- er's dead, and I'm divorced.

question: I see ...
answer: I thought this was "routine?"

question: Could I have his name? Just so I can officially eliminate him?
answer: Could I see your badge again?

question: Jesus. What are you doing here?
answer: Been trying to call, your line's down .. I just wanna let you know we're taking the guard off today.

question: I'm taking her back to the Instit- ute. Her new term starts tomorrow.
answer: Not gonna try and bail him are you? I really wouldn't bother, Margie ..

question: Are you getting in the way of it?
answer: There's no one here.

question: Where are they?
answer: Mom took her back to the institute.

question: Is Margie with her? Is she with her?
answer: No, she came back and went out ag- ain .. gone to see Auntie Charles ..

question: Come on, Bobby, for God's sake. I wanna get the man that killed him.
answer: I hate you .. I really hate you ..
